room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by The Escape Room Woodbridge in New Brunswick
room_description:
The museum has a grand new attraction. For a short time, visitors can lay their eyes on the New Hope Diamond. No one knows where it came from and because of it’s value, tests can rarely be performed on it. Its mystery draws in a lot of would be collectors.
It took months of planning, but this is the night. The guards have been paid off. The janitor placed everything you need in secure places. Most of the museum’s security is down. Now it’s up to you and your team to infiltrate, steal the Hope Diamond and escape without making a sound!
